QAPair.Question: What is (are) Changing your sleep habits ?
QAPair.Answer: Sleep patterns are often learned as children. When we repeat these patterns over many years, they become habits. Insomnia is difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep. In many cases, you can relieve insomnia by making a few simple lifestyle changes. But, it may take some time if you have had the same sleep habits for years.
